\begin{matlabcode}
% Solve equation
% log(cos(y))dx+x*tan(y)dy=0
% dx/x+tan(y)*dy/log(cos(y))=0

% 1)
syms x y;
eq1=int(1/x,x)+int(tan(y)/log(cos(y)),y)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
eq1 = 
    $\displaystyle \log \left(x\right)-\log \left(\log \left(\cos \left(y\right)\right)\right)$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
% log(log(cos(y))) = log(x) + log(C)
% log(cos(y))=C*x
% y=acos(exp(C*x))

% 2)
% log(cos(y))dx+x*tan(y)dy=0
% dy/dx = -log(cos(y))/(x*tan(y))
syms x y(x);
eqn = diff(y(x)) == -log(cos(y))/(x*tan(y))
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
eqn(x) = 
    $\displaystyle \frac{\partial }{\partial x}\text{ }y\left(x\right)=-\frac{\log \left(\cos \left(y\left(x\right)\right)\right)}{x \tan \left(y\left(x\right)\right)}$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
ySol(x) = dsolve(eqn)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
ySol(x) = 
    $\displaystyle \left\lbrace \begin{array}{cl}
\text{acos}\left(e^{x e^{-C_{13} } } \right) & \text{ if  }e^{x e^{-C_{13} } } \in \left\lbrack -1,1\right\rbrack 
\end{array}\right.$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
% acos(exp(C5*x))

% Checking
syms C5;
ySol=acos(exp(C5*x))
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
ySol = 
    $\displaystyle \text{acos}\left(e^{C_5  x} \right)$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
eq5=diff(y,x)+log(cos(y))/(x*tan(y))
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
eq5(x) = 
    $\displaystyle \frac{\partial }{\partial x}\text{ }y\left(x\right)+\frac{\log \left(\cos \left(y\left(x\right)\right)\right)}{x \tan \left(y\left(x\right)\right)}$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
eq6=simplify(subs(eq5,y,ySol))
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
eq6(x) = 
    $\displaystyle \frac{e^{C_5  x}  {\left(\log \left(e^{C_5  x} \right)-C_5  x\right)}}{x \sqrt{1-e^{2 C_5  x} }}$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
